tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProteinStructures (
  structure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  structure_name VARCHAR(255),
  resolution FLOAT,
  ligand_id INT,
  ligand_name VARCHAR(255),
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id INT,
    ligand_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES protein_structures(protein_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ligand_id) REFERENCES ligands(ligand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Ligand_Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    structure_id INT,
    ligand_name VARCHAR(255),
    affinity FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (structure_id) REFERENCES Protein_Structures(structure_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Experimental_Data (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    structure_id INT,
    measurement_type VARCHAR(100),
    value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (structure_id) REFERENCES Protein_Structures(structure_id)
);
